id.description: A unique identifier for the filter. If not provided, it defaults to the title, and then the filter type if neither is provided. You must ensure that this value is unique.

hideFromHeader.description: Whether to hide this filter from showing in the header view and only show it in the full sheet view.

type.description: A filter that allows for text entry. Providing "author" or "artist" for the filter id will indicate that authors and artists provided for entries can be searched using this filter.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text shown when the text input is empty.

type.description: A filter that shows a list of sorting options. The filter value is an object with an index and an ascending boolean.

canAscend.description: Whether the sort options can be changed to ascending order.

default.description: The default value for the filter.

type.description: A filter that provides a single two-state or tri-state selection.

name.description: The name of the filter. This value is shown on the filter selection, while the title is shown above. If not provided, the title will be used.

canExclude.description: Whether filter can be excluded as well as included (tri-state).

default.description: The default value for the filter.

type.description: A filter that allows a single selection from a list of options.

isGenre.description: Whether the filter is a genre filter. Genre filters default to using tag style and allow for filtering via the tags passed in entries.

usesTagStyle.description: Whether to use tag style for the filter. This defaults to false for non-genre filters, where a simple list of options is displayed.

options.description: The list of options for the filter.

ids.description: The list of values for the filter options. If not provided, the options will be used as the values.

default.description: The default value for the filter.

type.description: A filter that provides a list of options that allows multiple selections

isGenre.description: Whether the filter is a genre filter. Genre filters default to using tag style and allow for filtering via the tags passed in entries.

canExclude.description: Whether filter options can be excluded as well as included (tri-state).

usesTagStyle.description: Whether to use tag style for the filter. This defaults to false for non-genre filters, where a simple list of options is displayed.

options.description: The list of options for the filter.

ids.description: The list of values for the filter options. If not provided, the options will be used as the values.

defaultIncluded.description: The default included values for the filter.

defaultExcluded.description: The default excluded values for the filter.

type.description: A filter that provides non-editable text for info or explanation.
